description:
Iori and Kouhei attend class in their underwear like normal, but everyone glares at them with a bloodthirsty look in their eyes! It`s because they heard that Iori and Chisa are dating! Sensing their lives are in danger, Iori and Kouhei offer to setup a mixer. They ask Azusa to introduce her friends, but she brings Aina Yoshiwara, the "Cakey" girl from the Izu Spring Festival!
Source: Amazon
